name: SCP Foundation: MTF Tetris
description:
Welcom to SCP Foundation: MTF Tetris!

A themed Tetris based on the SCP Foundation.

Featuring classic Tetris mechanics, SCP Foundation: MTF Tetris includes three game modes.

In Classic mode you will play with the seven normal Tetris pieces.

In Pentanomic mode, you'll be pitted against twelve pentonyms, the original forms of the Russian wooden game that inspired the original creator of Tetris.

Finally, the Chaotic mode combines the seven pieces of the Classic mode, and the twelve of the Pentanomic mode, being the most difficult mode in the game with nineteen  pieces in total.

To anyone that is interested in the fantastic universe of the SCP Foundation, here is the link to the main wiki:

https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com

You can see this project in GitHub: https://github.com/UnityCarbonell/Foundation-SCP---MTF-Tetris
